import React, { useRef, useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; import './App.css'; import logo from './assets/logo.png'; function App() { const form = useRef(); const [bookingId, setBookingId] = useState(''); const generateBookingID = () => { const date = new Date().toISOString().slice(0,10).replace(/-/g,""); const randomStr = Math.random().toString(36).substring(2, 8).toUpperCase(); return `BK-${date}-${randomStr}`; }; useEffect(() => { setBookingId(generateBookingID()); }, []); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const file = e.target.image.files[0]; const reader = new FileReader(); reader.onload = () => { const base64Image = reader.result; const formData = { name: form.current.name.value, email: form.current.email.value, occupation: form.current.occupation.value, date: form.current.date.value, whatsapp: form.current.whatsapp.value, message: form.current.message.value, image: base64Image, booking_id: bookingId, }; emailjs.send('service_ted5m2h', 'template_nzvxr9o', formData, 'D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv') .then(() => { alert('Session request sent successfully. Our team will contact you after payment confirmation.'); form.current.reset(); setBookingId(generateBookingID()); }) .catch((error) => { console.error('Error:', error); alert('Something went wrong.\n' + (error?.text || error?.message || JSON.stringify(error))) }); emailjs.send('service_ted5m2h', 'template_5qmfosa', formData, 'D8Cr-U9g1MVqsc5bv'); }; reader.readAsDataURL(file); }; return (

Ghar-ki-Baat

Your space to speak.

What We Do Why Trust Us Pricing Book Session FAQ

When no one listens, we do.

At Ghar-ki-Baat, we offer confidential talk with light therapy that prioritize your emotional wellbeing. Your journey begins with a conversation.

What We Do

We provide private, secure, and empathetic consultation sessions with our team. Whether it's stress, relationship, personal dilemmas, or just the need to talk, Ghar-ki-Baat is here for you.

Why Trust Us?

  • 100% Confidentiality
  • Caring mentors
  • Flexible scheduling

Pricing

Basic ('Connect')

1 session (30 mins)

₹99

Standard ('Comfort')

1 sessions (60 mins)

₹179

Premium('Clarity')

5 sessions (60 mins) + reflection letter

₹769

Click the button to pay before submitting the booking form.

Our team will contact you after payment confirmation.

Testimonials

“Ghar-ki-Baat gave me the courage to open up and move forward. Highly recommended!”
“I felt heard and understood. Booking was easy and fast.”

Frequently Asked Questions

Is my session confidential?

Yes, 100% confidentiality is maintained.

How will I be contacted?

You'll receive an instant confirmation mail right after submitting the booking form . Once your payment is verified , our team will contact you via WhatsApp or email.

What if i book during late hours?

Form will be submitted after payment. Our team will get in touch with you during working hours.

Need Help?

Reach us directly for custom consultation or queries.

Email Us WhatsApp
